game.title: The Great Adventure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of ancient civilization
game.description: You are on a quest to explore ruins, solve puzzles, and uncover the hidden treasure that has been lost for centuries. Gather clues and face challenges along the way.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ancient ruins
task.description: You have heard rumors of a hidden entrance in the dense forest. Search for markers or symbols that might lead you to it.

task.objective: Solve the riddle at the temple gates
task.description: A puzzle must be solved to unlock the temple gates. The riddle reads: "I have keys but never lock, I have space but never hold. What am I?"

task.objective: Recover the three pieces of the artifact
task.description: The treasure is guarded by a magical seal that requires three broken pieces to be reunited. Find them within the temple chambers.
task.location: Temple chambers A, B, and C

task.description: The final piece of the treasure is hidden in a secret chamber. Once all pieces are in place, a portal to that chamber will open.
